<h1 align="center">
  Stari Kolomoni (UI Design)
</h1>

[![Designed using Affinity Designer](https://img.shields.io/badge/designed%20using-Affinity%20Designer-2088e4?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://affinity.serif.com/en-gb/designer/)

This repository contains UI mockups, icons and various other design-related content for the Stari Kolomoni project.

---
